00038 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 
00041 #include "pizAlgorithmsMaxMSP.h"
00042 
00043 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 
00046 void pizFactorOracleSetBackwardThreshold (PIZFactorOracle *x, long n)
00047 {
00048     if (n >= 0) {
00049             x->backwardThreshold = n;
00050         }
00051 }
00052 
00053 void pizFactorOracleSetStraightRatio (PIZFactorOracle *x, double f)
00054 {
00055     if ((f >= 0.) && (f <= 1.)) {
00056             x->straightRatio = f;
00057         }
00058 }
00059 
00060 long pizFactorOracleBackwardThreshold (const PIZFactorOracle *x)
00061 {
00062     return x->backwardThreshold;
00063 }
00064 
00065 double pizFactorOracleStraightRatio (const PIZFactorOracle *x)
00066 {
00067     return x->straightRatio;
00068 }
00069 
00070 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 
00073 PIZError pizFactorOracleEncodeToArray (const PIZFactorOracle *x, long node, PIZGrowingArray *a)
00074 {
00075     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00076     
00077     if ((node < x->index) && a) {
00078             err = PIZ_GOOD;
00079             
00080             err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend        (a, x->nodes[node].referTo);
00081             err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend        (a, x->nodes[node].lengthRepeatedSuffix);
00082             err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend        (a, pizGrowingArrayCount (x->nodes[node].arcDestinations));
00083             err |= pizGrowingArrayAppendArray   (a, x->nodes[node].arcDestinations);
00084             err |= pizGrowingArrayAppendArray   (a, x->nodes[node].arcValues);
00085         }
00086     
00087     return err;
00088 }
